location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 114; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is also present in parallel between ff 2-113; these numbers are written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file comprises applications, in Arabic, for the payment of sums of money to the Agency Court, Bahrain in relation to the formal registration of documents as part of criminal or civil proceedings being heard there. Also included are applications for certified copies of previously submitted forms to be used in proceedings in other countries. Some of the forms include notes written in English for the attention of the Political Agent, Bahrain regarding them.Also included in the file are reports submitted to the Political Agent in 1924 which regard the registration of documents and detail the number of documents pending in the Agency Office and their progress.
